item.title: CVE-2019-1255|2024-08-04T18:13:29.704Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20security%20essentials
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists when Microsoft Defender improperly handles files, aka 'Microsoft Defender Denial of Service Vulnerability'.
